Pre-Game Insights: India maintains a significant psychological advantage due to their experience in ICC championship finals and momentum in breaking milestones.
South Africa has an unpredictable nature in meetings against India, promising a confident fight for survival and triumph in the championship match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A grand celebration of T20 cricket is expected.
Rahul Dravid's farewell game as India coach is a notable aspect.
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli are expected to put up a special performance.
Billions of Indian fans will be glued to their TV and streaming platforms to witness India lift the T20 World Cup trophy for the second time.
Others: The match will be played at Kensington Oval, Barbados.
The match will be played on Saturday, June 29, 2024, at 8 pm IST.
India has 14 wins in 26 matches against South Africa in T20Is.
